item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 8, 2025 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:

23. Stop using zip codes for geospatial analysis (2019) (164 points | 121 comments)

25. Radiation belts detected around Earth after solar storm (130 points | 51 comments)
26. The origins of 60-Hz as a power frequency (153 points | 197 comments)

28. The superconductivity of layered graphene (121 points | 30 comments)
29. The evolution of annunciator signaling for telephones (79 points | 13 comments)
